title: League of who trolls harder
body: Literally just had a game where we had a thresh adc on our team, and an afk sion on the other team. We won.

replies.body:
I just won a game with Wukong ADC, Zed top, Lee jungle, Yasuo mid, and myself playing Jayce support.

Other team FF 15 when Lee got a penta behind our inner turret.

Blind pick is amazing.
